name: Notion Resume Template for Free
description: Create your minimal and clean interactive Resume fast!Introducing our simple and clean resume template for Notion! This digital product is perfect for anyone looking to create a professional, modern resume without the hassle of complicated design software. The template is fully customizable and easy to use, with sections for education, experience, skills, and more. You can easily sharing and sending to potential employers. Say goodbye to cluttered and outdated resumes and stand out with our clea
features: Minimal and clean design; Experience and Education timeline view; Social links with icons; Contact me section; Skills card with progress bar; Show your featured projects in cards; Hobbies and Interests cards with icons
